title: Four Bedroom House for Sale in Pannipitiya
details:
Brand new house offering extensive living space with four bedrooms and three bathrooms. The house features two large living area’s on the ground and first floor with a high ceiling and plenty of natural light.

The master bedroom sits on the first floor, thoughtfully designed with plenty of closet space and a spacious master bathroom including a rain shower. Additionally there are two bedrooms on the 1st floor sharing a common bathroom, and a guest room & bathroom on the ground floor. Spacious pantry with fitted cupboards, separate wet kitchen with service entrance. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in an impressive and convenient location.

- Four large bedrooms, three bathrooms. Two bedrooms equipped with A/C.
- Spacious living & dining room.
- Separate pantry and wet kitchen, both fitted with cupboards.
- Landscaped garden surrounding house.
- Provision for solar powered water heating system.
- Separate maids bedroom and bathroom.
- Electric roller garage door with two covered parking spaces.
- CCTV system installed.

Price negotiable upon inspection. Viewings can be arranged by appointment only.
